p: The MIC of the CLOX obtained for S. aureus ATCC 29213 at pH 7.4 was 0.125 μg/mL, which is in accordance with the recommendations of the CLSI 2009 ( 32). The 3 wild strains (named SA13, SA96, and SA139) presented a MIC of 0.5 μg/mL at pH 7.4. In all cases, a decrease in this concentration was observed when acidifying the culture medium (Table 2).
